_metadata.title: Multi-Language Hinting Test Phrases
_metadata.description: Code-switching and expressions from other languages that might contain crisis-adjacent terms. Tests the system's ability to handle multilingual content.
_metadata.note: Phrases may need manual review as language context affects meaning. Expected priorities vary based on actual content meaning.

spanish_codeswitching.message: Estoy tan cansada, I just can't deal with this anymore today
spanish_codeswitching.description: Spanish-English code-switch expressing tiredness - low priority

spanish_codeswitching.message: No puedo más with all this stress at work
spanish_codeswitching.description: Spanish phrase meaning 'I can't take anymore' in work context - low priority

spanish_codeswitching.message: Ay dios mío, this day is never ending
spanish_codeswitching.description: Spanish exclamation with English complaint - none/low

spanish_codeswitching.message: Me duele la cabeza and I'm over everything
Qué horror this meeting was, never again
I'm so agotado from this week, necesito sleep
Esto es una pesadilla, this project will never end
Ya no aguanto más these deadlines

french_expressions.message: C'est la vie, sometimes things just don't work out
french_expressions.description: French expression meaning 'that's life' - none priority

french_expressions.message: Je suis fatiguée de tout this constant drama
french_expressions.description: French-English expressing tiredness of drama - low priority

french_expressions.message: Quel cauchemar this commute was today
french_expressions.description: French nightmare expression for bad commute

french_expressions.message: Je m'en fiche honestly, not my problem anymore
Mon dieu, the audacity of some people
I'm feeling très overwhelmed right now
C'est n'importe quoi this whole situation

german_expressions.message: I have such Weltschmerz today, everything feels heavy
german_expressions.description: German term for world-weariness - low/medium priority

german_expressions.message: This Schadenfreude is real watching them fail
german_expressions.description: German term for pleasure at others' misfortune - none

german_expressions.message: The Wanderlust is hitting hard, need to travel
german_expressions.description: German term for travel desire - none

german_expressions.message: Having major Fernweh, I need to be anywhere but here
german_expressions.description: German term for longing for distant places

german_expressions.message: This is giving Angst but like, in a productive way
Total Kopfkino about this presentation tomorrow

japanese_expressions.message: Feeling very 仕方がない about this situation
japanese_expressions.description: Japanese term meaning 'it can't be helped' - none priority

japanese_expressions.message: This is giving 辛い energy honestly
japanese_expressions.description: Japanese word for painful/spicy used casually

japanese_expressions.message: Such a めんどくさい task, don't want to do it
The 空気 in that room was so awkward

portuguese_expressions.message: Tenho tanta saudade, I miss everyone so much
portuguese_expressions.description: Portuguese expression of longing/missing - low priority

portuguese_expressions.message: Que chatice this whole thing is
I'm feeling very desanimado about work
Isto é uma confusão, I can't follow this

tagalog_codeswitching.message: Nakakastress naman this deadline, I'm so overwhelmed
tagalog_codeswitching.description: Tagalog-English expressing stress about deadline - low priority

tagalog_codeswitching.message: Ang hirap naman, this is so difficult
Sobrang pagod na ako, I need rest

italian_expressions.message: I'm feeling very stanco, need a nap
Mamma mia what a disaster today was
This is troppo, I can't handle any more

korean_expressions.message: This is so 답답해, nothing is working
아이고 what a mess this became

hindi_expressions.message: Bahut thak gaya yaar, so exhausted

mixed_cultural.message: It's all very mañana mañana with my motivation lately
mixed_cultural.description: Spanish expression about procrastination - none/low priority

mixed_cultural.message: Having a total ennui moment today, nothing interests me
mixed_cultural.description: French term for listless boredom - low priority

mixed_cultural.message: Very hygge vibes needed right now
mixed_cultural.description: Danish term for cozy comfort - none

mixed_cultural.message: This ikigai search is exhausting me
mixed_cultural.description: Japanese term for life purpose - none/low

mixed_cultural.message: Need some lagom in my life, everything is extreme
Major wabi-sabi energy accepting this mess
